# CFXMLParserContext

**Structure**

Contains version information and function pointers to callbacks used when handling a program-defined context.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CFXMLParserContext
```

## Overview

You can associate a context with a parser when the parser is created. The context can be anything you wish and will be passed as a parameter to all of the XML parser callbacks.

## Initializers

- **init()**
- **init(version:info:retain:release:copyDescription:)**

## Instance Properties

- **copyDescription**: A copy description callback for your program-defined context data. Optional.
- **info**: An arbitrary program-defined value passed to all the callbacks in this structure and in the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFXMLParserCallBacks] structure.
- **release**: A release callback for your program-defined context data. Optional.
- **retain**: A retain callback for your program-defined context data. Optional.
- **version**: Version number of this structure. Must be 0.

## Data Types

- **CFXMLParserCallBacks**: Contains version information and function pointers to callbacks needed when parsing XML.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
